ingredients: 24 slices pepperoni, or pizza toppings of your choice
recipe: Spread each cracker with 1/2 teaspoon pizza sauce, place a slice of pepperoni on top, and sprinkle with about 1 tablespoon of shredded mozzarella cheese. Place crackers onto a microwave safe plate.
Microwave on High for 1 to 2 minutes, until cheese melts.
